HiddenText.Name: Social Manager
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Mangers are responsible to actually create, plan and carry out events and activities. The Manager is responsible to recruit and then teach/train/mentor a council who will assist the Manager in creating, planning and carrying out of events and activities that meet the mission statement and vision for Social-Activities. Managers regularly report to and are trained by Coordinators. The Manager is required to attend at least one meeting during the week- the Social Board meeting and attend one overnight retreat during the semester. Additional meetings will most likely be required as circumstances and events require.
